item.title: Advanced Learning Rate
item.description: A summary of advanced learning rate As a researcher, most of the time is to build an approriate prototype for tasks. The learning rate is one of the most important things need to be taken care of. It works like its name e.g a small value learnign rate means trainig a model in a slow speed, vice versa.
